query:
SELECT t.id, t.title, t.albumId, t.trackNumber,
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audioFiles af WHERE af.trackId = t.id) as has_audio
FROM tracks t
WHERE t.albumId = (SELECT id FROM albums WHERE title LIKE '%Still Out Tonight%' LIMIT 1)
ORDER BY t.trackNumber;
